title: When Riot respects my opinion the game will be better.
body:
None of your opinions matter.

Not even that of the developers only mine.

Fiora is ruined. 

Change her back. 

Make it so you don't need smite to have a Hunter's Machete.

When you've done that I'll quit reminding you every day about it. 

After that the 1st E-sport won't be ruined anymore.

replies.body: It's a good thing no one cares about your opinion.

If none of our opinions matter, why does yours? Hunter's Machete is the way it is to prevent people from abusing it. Want to use it? Take Smite. 

I'm sure all of the Fiora mains will be glad to hear that you have descended from the heavens to tell the actually mechanically useful champion they have now, with its unique skillset and thematic fittings, should return to the RNG BS that was her old ultimate.

Because I am the greatest Fiora of all time...

In fact I am the greatest player of all time in Leauge of Legends and Riot nerfed me and banned me from ranked to be a jerk.

I want an apology and I want my champion back.
I'm sure that will work out just as well as when you were daily spamming the boards that you were gonna feed if they did not revert Fiora some one year ago.
And why excactly give hunters machete to non smite users?

Real junglers don't use smite. 

It was how they nerfed Fiora's jungling to be a dick.
well ok my jungler always misses smite too so....
